entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: SE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
